title: Retired Marine Forced to Remove ‘USMC Decals,’ Neighbors Keep Obama Stickers
subtitle: Was a retired marine forced to remove USMC decals from his car or be fined, while his neighbors kept their Obama stickers?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A retired Marine was forced to remove USMC decals from his car or be fined, while neighbors were allowed to keep their Obama stickers without incident.
